ygData.subject: Re: about the new enchant items
ygData.msgSnippet: Thant would be very handy....O well will have to wait and see... ... From: Mike Cummins To: eqenchanters@onelist.com Sent: Tuesday, 20 July 1999 11:15:PM
ygData.messageBody:
Thant would be very handy....O well will have to wait and see...
----- Original Message -----
From: Mike Cummins
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, 20 July 1999 11:15:PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] about the new enchant items


It sounds like we will be able to enchant already made items, and possibly materials for blacksmithing, weaponsmithing etc..

----- Original Message -----
From: Freedom
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 12:21 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] about the new enchant items


I was wondering will this allow as to enchant other stuff apart for bar's of silver and such.
